name: xernerx-commands
description: An extension for the xernerx framework containing a collection of commands useful for when developing a bot.
author: Dummi

scripts.checks: npm i && npm fund && npm audit fix --force && tsc -w
scripts.patch: git add . && git commit -m "Version Patch" && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.minor: git add . && git commit -m "Version Upgrade" && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.major: git add . && git commit -m "Version Rewrite" && npm version major && npm publish
